movies.title: La estanquera de Vallecas
movies.plot: A couple of ruffians enters a tobacconist in the neighborhood of Vallecas to steal. Having failed in its intention they finish entrench themselves in the place, being surrounded by police.
movies.simplePlot: A couple of ruffians enters a tobacconist in the neighborhood of Vallecas to steal. Having failed in its intention they finish entrench themselves in the place, being surrounded by police.

biography.bio: Emma Penella was born on March 2, 1930 in Madrid, Spain as Manuela Ruiz Penella. She was an actress, known for Aquí no hay quien viva (2003), Le bourreau (1963) and Fortunata and Jacinta (1970). She was married to Emiliano Piedra. She died on August 27, 2007 in Madrid.
biography.name: Emma Penella

biography.bio: José Luis Gómez was born on April 19, 1940 in Huelva, Huelva, Andalucía, Spain as José Luis Gómez García. He is known for his work on La piel que habito (2011), Broken Embraces (2009) and Goya's Ghosts (2006).
biography.name: José Luis Gómez

biography.bio: José Luis Manzano was born on December 30, 1963 in Toledo, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain as José Luis Manzano Agudo. He was an actor, known for El pico 2 (1984), El pico (1983) and Navajeros (1980). He died on February 20, 1992 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: José Luis Manzano

biography.bio: Maribel Verdú was born on October 2, 1970 in Madrid, Spain as María Isabel Verdú Rollán. She is an actress, known for Snow White (2012), Pan's Labyrinth (2006) and Y Tu Mamá También (2001). She is the older sister of twins Marina and Carlota and she has been married to Pedro Larrañaga since September 1999.
biography.name: Maribel Verdú

biography.bio: Fernando Guillén was born on November 22, 1932 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Fernando Gallego Guillén. He was an actor, known for All About My Mother (1999), Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown (1988) and La loi du désir (1987). He was married to Gemma Cuervo. He died on January 17, 2013 in Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Fernando Guillén

biography.bio: Jesús Puente was born on December 18, 1930 in Madrid, Spain as Jesús Puente Alzaga. He is known for his work on Su media naranja (1990), Lo que necesitas es amor (1993) and Asignatura aprobada (1987). He was married to Licia Calderón and María Luisa Rubio. He died on October 26, 2000 in Madrid.
biography.name: Jesús Puente

biography.bio: Antonio Gamero was born on March 2, 1934 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as Antonio Gamero Aguirre. He was an actor and director, known for Manolito Four Eyes (1999), Madregilda (1993) and Furtivos (1975). He died on July 26, 2010 in Madrid.
biography.name: Antonio Gamero

biography.bio: Antonio Iranzo was born on May 4, 1930 in Valencia, Valencia, Spain as Antonio Iranzo Escorihuela. He was an actor, known for Who Can Kill a Child? (1976), Burnt Skin (1967) and Cut-Throats Nine (1972). He died on July 7, 2003 in Valencia, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain.
biography.name: Antonio Iranzo

biography.bio: Pedro Nieva Parola is an actor, known for La estanquera de Vallecas (1987), Werther (1986) and El pico (1983).
biography.name: Pedro Nieva Parola

biography.bio: Tina Sáinz was born on February 26, 1945 in Madrid, Spain as María Fernanda Agustina Sáinz Rubio. She is an actress and casting director, known for Mes adorables voisins (2004), Compañeros (1998) and Story of a Kiss (2002).
biography.name: Tina Sáinz

biography.bio: Chari Moreno was an actress, known for Attends-moi au ciel (1988), La estanquera de Vallecas (1987) and Don Juan, My Dear Ghost (1990). She died in 1991.
biography.name: Chari Moreno

biography.bio: Mabel Ordóñez was born as Maria Isabel Ordóñez. She is a talent agent and actress.
biography.name: Mabel Ordóñez

biography.bio: Coral Pellicer was born in 1937 in València, València, Comunitat Valenciana, Spain. She is an actress, known for Aunt Tula (1964), The Search (1966) and The Sleeping Voice (2011).
biography.name: Coral Pellicer

biography.bio: Raquel Daina is an actress, known for An Angel Has Appeared (1961), La estanquera de Vallecas (1987) and Marcada por los hombres (1977).
biography.name: Raquel Daina

biography.bio: Elvira Díez is an actress, known for La estanquera de Vallecas (1987).
biography.name: Elvira Díez
